text: Chorley is a constituency in the United Kingdom. It is in the county of Lancashire in England. ==Election results== The Liberal Democrats, the Conservatives, and Labour did not participant in the constituency, as it is tradition that they do not stand against the Speaker of the House of Commons. The Green Party does not take part in the tradition and had it's own candidate in the constituency. This candidate was James Melling. The Brexit Party did not stand an official candidate. However their former candidate stood as an independent, having changed his name on the ballot to Mark Brexit-Smith. ==References== Category:Westminster Parliamentary constituencies in England Category:Lancashire
title: Chorley (UK Parliament constituency)
